column2: The peasants have risen up in [Root.GetName], led by a disgruntled former soldier. The rebels have the nerve to demand independence!
The peasants have risen up in [From.GetName], led by a disgruntled former soldier. The rebels have the nerve to demand independence!
Even more peasants have risen up in [Root.GetName], reinforcing the ongoing revolt!
Even more peasants have risen up in [From.GetName], reinforcing the ongoing revolt!
[Root.Religion.GetName] heretics have risen up in [Root.GetName], led by a militant fanatic. If not swiftly crushed, this revolt could spread like wildfire!
[From.Religion.GetName] heretics have risen up in [From.GetName], led by a militant fanatic. If not swiftly crushed, this revolt could spread like wildfire!
Another mob of raving heretics have risen up in [Root.GetName], reinforcing the ongoing uprising!
Another mob of raving heretics have risen up in [From.GetName], reinforcing the ongoing uprising!

A dangerous revolt has broken out in [Root.GetName]. Many prominent [Root.Culture.GetName] landholders have raised an army of peasants, trained and led by a core of proper soldiers. They seek to restore the [Root.Kingdom.GetFullBaseName]!

A dangerous revolt has broken out in [From.GetName]. Many prominent [From.Culture.GetName] landholders have raised an army of peasants, trained and led by a core of proper soldiers. They seek to restore the [From.Kingdom.GetFullBaseName]!
More [Root.Culture.GetName] rebels have taken up arms in [Root.GetName], joining the struggle to restore the [Root.Kingdom.GetFullBaseName]!
More [From.Culture.GetName] rebels have taken up arms in [From.GetName], joining the struggle to restore the [From.Kingdom.GetFullBaseName]!
[Root.Religion.GetName] rebels have risen up in [Root.GetName], led by a militant [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]. If not swiftly crushed, this revolt could spread like wildfire!
[From.Religion.GetName] rebels have risen up in [From.GetName], led by a militant [From.Religion.GetPriestTitle]. If not swiftly crushed, this revolt could spread like wildfire!
Another raving mob of [Root.Religion.GetName] infidels have risen up in [Root.GetName], reinforcing the ongoing uprising!
Another raving mob of [From.Religion.GetName] infidels have risen up in [From.GetName], reinforcing the ongoing uprising!
A rebel mob breaks down my door and streams into the room. It's no use pleading for my life, I will go out fighting!
Rebels killed §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! after taking §Y[FromFrom.GetName]§! in §Y[FromFrom.County.GetName]§!.
Blasted traitors!
Treacherous rabble!
Accursed Renegades!
Beware the Heretic!
Worrisome...
Curses!
Infidel Scum!
Die you bastards! Arrgh...
They will all hang for this!
Accursed Infidels!
